overview: Veronica Rodriguez, Odette Delacroix, and Kiera Winters are three very different girls who are brought together by their mutual love of sexual pleasure. • Lusty blonde Violet slips into some sheer lingerie for the benefit of her lover Jessa Rhodes. • Marry Lynn and Scarlet Red are on a roller skating date that gets naughty when the girls find a pole with which they can practice their sexy moves! • Gorgeous redhead Elle Alexandra once again finds herself nude in bed and cuddling with two beautiful ladies, this time with brunette Kiera Winters and blonde Elaina Rae.
title: Show Me What You Like
